description: Create Bullshitard page in chronicles with all content from current project, styled and themed appropriately
context: Created bullshitard directory and main page.tsx with hero section, terminal window, stats grid, navigation cards, and warning section. Used bullshitard theme colors and included all content sections.
Created confession page with full content from THE_BULLSHITARD_CONFESSION.md, properly styled with bullshitard theme colors, terminal windows for code examples, and structured sections.

Created architecture page with full content from THE_BULLSHIT_ARCHITECTURE.md, including ASCII diagrams, code examples, performance metrics grid, and technical specifications. All styled with bullshitard theme.
